name: moodle_data_grabber
description: Logs into Moodle and downloads assignment submissions + submission data

parameters.name: moodle_base_url
parameters.description: The location where the instance of Moodle to log into and download from is hosted at. Needs to look like this: http[s]://my.school.com/path/to/moodle (no trailing slash)

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the Moodle account to use for downloading

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The password of the Moodle account to use for downloading

parameters.name: assignment_id
parameters.description: The ID of the assignment of which submissions will be downloaded
